section.p: Information about patient symptoms and complaints

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:11416 ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.10.1.9"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:10755)/@code="67666-8" EMS situation Narrative NEMSIS (CodeSystem: ) (CONF:10756)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] title which SHOULD equal "EMS Situation Section" (CONF:10758)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] text (CONF:10757)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain [1..*] entry such that it (CONF:11039)
Conforms to Complaint (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.10.1.63)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain [1..1] entry such that it (CONF:11041)
Conforms to Possible Injury (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.10.1.64)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain [1..1] entry such that it (CONF:11043)
Conforms to Provider Primary Impression (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.10.1.65)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain [1..1] entry such that it (CONF:11045)
Conforms to Primary Symptom (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.10.1.66)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain [1..1] entry such that it (CONF:11047)
Conforms to Other Symptoms (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.10.1.67)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain [1..1] entry such that it (CONF:11049)
Conforms to Provider Secondary Impressions (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.10.1.68)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain [1..1] entry such that it (CONF:11051)
Conforms to Initial Patient Acuity (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.10.1.69)
